did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Records of the San Xavier Indian Reservation Water Users' Association, 1939-1949

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: San Xavier Indian Reservation Water Users' Association

did.abstract: The San Xavier Indian Reservation Water Users' Association was concerned with development of irrigation on the San Xavier Indian Reservation, Pima County, Arizona. This collection includes minutes of meetings, 1940-1945; time sheets for Indian laborers, May-Aug. 1949, correspondence of various government officials concerning irrigation development on the Reservation, 1939-1945; and miscellaneous papers relating to agricultural use of the land by the Tohono O'Odham.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Records of the San Xavier Indian Reservation Water Users' Association (AZ 254). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Association concerned with development of irrigation on the San Xavier Indian Reservation, Pima County, Ariz.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into 3 series. Chronological arrangement is followed within each series.

list.item: Series III: Correspondence and miscellaneous papers, 1939-1945,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Minutes of meetings, 1940-1945; time sheets for Indian laborers, May-Aug. 1949, correspondence of various government officials concerning irrigation development on the Reservation, 1939-1945; and miscellaneous papers relating to agricultural use of the land by the Tohono O'Odham.
An inventory is available in the library.
